cause.description:
Kampuchea (the native word for Cambodia) for Christ seeks to minister to the needy and lost in Cambodia. Founded in 1995, Kampuchea for Christ (KfC) is a nondenominational group that evangelizes the lost, tends to the needy, and strengthens the Body of Christ manifested here on earth in His Church.
Kampuchea for Christ currently has seven major ministries to Cambodia:
1. Advancing the Kingdom of God in Cambodia
2. Meeting the needs of the poor, hurting and lost in Cambodia
cause.mission: bringing the love of Christ to Cambodia through enriching the peoples lives.
cause.name: Kampuchea for Christ
